dashboard.label: Suspicious Traffic
dashboard.description: Odd Network Traffic. Unusual stuff. Outliers.

search.query: sourcetype=stream:dhcp host=pantroglodyte earliest=-24h dest_ip!=255.255.255.255 NOT [search sourcetype=stream:dhcp host=pantroglodyte earliest=-24h latest=-4h | stats count by src_mac | fields src_mac | rename src_mac as dest_mac ] | dedup _time | search opcode=DHCPACK | table dest_ip dest_mac _time

sourcetype="stream:tcp" dest_ip!=10.0.0.0/8 dest_ip!=192.168.0.0/16 dest_ip!=172.16.0.0/12 | streamstats global=f window=2 range(_time) as time_range by src_ip, dest_ip, dest_port | where time_range > 0| stats avg(time_range) as avg, var(time_range) as var, stdev(time_range) as stdev, count by src_ip, dest_ip, dest_port, owner | iplocation dest_ip | where stdev < (avg*.05) and count > 2 | sort -count

sourcetype="stream:udp" dest_ip!=10.0.0.0/8 dest_ip!=192.168.0.0/16 dest_ip!=172.16.0.0/12 | streamstats global=f window=2 range(_time) as time_range by src_ip, dest_ip, dest_port | where time_range > 0| stats avg(time_range) as avg, var(time_range) as var, stdev(time_range) as stdev, count by src_ip, dest_ip, dest_port, owner | iplocation dest_ip | where stdev < (avg*.05) and count > 2 | sort -count

sourcetype="stream:tcp" OR sourcetype=stream:udp dest_ip!=10.0.0.0/8 dest_ip!=192.168.0.0/16 dest_ip!=172.16.0.0/12 | streamstats global=f window=2 range(_time) as time_range by src_ip, dest_ip, dest_port | where time_range > 0| stats avg(time_range) as avg, var(time_range) as var, stdev(time_range) as stdev, count by src_ip, dest_ip, dest_port, owner | eval remote_socket=dest_ip+":"+dest_port | iplocation dest_ip | where stdev < (avg*.05) and count > 2 | geostats values(count) by remote_socket
